title: A Future for the past
creator_credit: World Wide Pictures and Peter Bradford
brief_description: Considers action to prevent the erosion of character in Britain’s historic towns and villages. Old photographs, live action and superimposed animation explain why and how towns change and what has been done and might be done in the future in areas worthy of conservation.
